title: The Problem of Political Authority by Michael Huemer, mobi epub
description:
In this work of astounding and profound unoriginality, Michael Huemer boldly goes where numerous brighter minds have gone before--over, and over, and over again. He rehashes and regurgitates the work of Ayn Rand, Murray Rothbard, Henry David Thoreau, A. John Simmons, Robert Paul Wolff, Albert Jay Nock, FrÃƒÂ©dÃƒÂ©ric Bastiat, Jan Narveson and many others, often without attribution or a proper reference. Nevertheless, he does stop short of taking credit for coining the terms "anarchy" and "capitalism".

Comically, the one region of anarchist thought Huemer has conveniently forgotten to retread is that of intellectual property, as the book's front matter threatens readers with a multitude of civil and criminal actions should they spread Huemer's unoriginal thought without his permission.

Those who know nothing at all about philosophical anarchism may find the book a good introduction, whereas those well-versed in the subject will find in it not one original thought or idea
